```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE, fig.path = "../figures/", fig.width = 5, fig.height = 6)
```

```{r summary_table, eval=TRUE}
library(kableExtra)
library(dplyr)
library(magrittr)
library(stringr)

# setwd("tables")
dt <- read.csv("../data/mcmc/model_r2.csv", 
                     stringsAsFactors = FALSE) 

options(knitr.kable.NA = "-")  
dplyr::filter(dt, str_detect(Model, "tp")) %>%
  dplyr::select(-Model) %>%
  dplyr::rename("$R^2$" = Estimate) %>%
  knitr::kable(digits = 2, format = "markdown", caption = "TP Model R2")
```
